segments.text: I see the girl reaching out for a cookie, her eyes full of excitement.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s so focused on the boy and the jar that she doesn’t see the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is tilting, and the boy is barely keeping his balance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn’t fall and take her down with him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still drying dishes, completely unaware of the chaos behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is still pouring out of the sink, and the puddle is getting bigger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe she hasn’t turned off the faucet yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretching so far that he’s almost falling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting, completely trusting that he won’t drop her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like this is all going to end in tears.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is a mix of innocence and impending disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR
